戰鬥演出運鏡 = Battle performance sports lens
閒置多久後啟動省電模式 = Auto enable power-saving mode after:
只有自己 = Only self
開 = On
關 = Off
自訂畫質 = Custom
極致畫面 = High quality
性能均衡 = Balanced
省電順暢 = Battery saving
性能優先 = High efficiency
特技的範圍，有可能隨著特技等級提升而變大 = The skill area might improve in higher skill levels.
若交通工具在海上、空中等非一般陸地的地方損壞，角色將會回到記錄點 = If a vehicle is broken while traveling on air or sea, you will return to your save point.
裝備大多有等級限制，等級足夠才可穿戴 = Most equipment has level restrictions and can only be worn if the requirements are met.
想製作交通工具，必須先取得「設計圖」 = If you want to make a transport, you must first obtain its design.
非人形的夥伴才可裝備馬鞍類裝備 = Only non-human pets can wear saddles
在各地的港口通常可找到水手，支付其「乘船券」可前往其他港口 = Sailors are usually found in ports everywhere, and you can reach  other ports by paying them in boat tickets.
四大屬性相互剋制：地剋水、水剋火、火剋風、風剋地 = The four major attributes control each other as in: earth -> water -> fire -> wind -> earth
火屬性的 ATK、MATK 成長比其他屬性還高 = Fire types receive more ATK and MATK than other attributes
進行合成時，可選擇要使用那一個階級的鍊金術 = When doing alchemy, you can choose which alchemy level to use
與木人樁等級差距若超過 20 級，則只能獲得 1 點經驗值 = When training on wooden poles, if the gap between the player and pole level is over 20, you can only get 1 exp
夥伴每升一級，友好度將 +1 = Your pet receives +1 amity for each level up
每提升一級，將有 3 點屬性點可分配 = You receive 3 attribute points to allocate for each level up
部分的特殊特技必須透過任務習得 = Some special skills must be obtained through quests
生活技能等級越高，可收集到的資源種類越多 = The higher your life skills level, the more types of resources you can collect
馬鞍類裝備可透過「馬鞍強化丸」強化其效果 = You can enhance saddle-type equipment through Saddle Pills.
部分家具必須先取得「設計圖」才能製作 = Some furniture require a design to make.
據說這世界中存在著可暫時提升經驗值吸收量的的神奇藥水 = Legend says there are magical potions in this world that temporarily increase the amount of experience you receive.
部分曾造訪過的地點，可透過「地圖傳送」介面直接傳送 = You can teleport to some already visited locations through the "Teleport Map" interface
最高可捕捉高於自身等級 5 級的對象\n※裝備「捕捉網」則可以捕捉高 15 等的對象 = You can catch pets up to 5 level higher. The "Capture Net" can catch pets up to 15 levels higher!
部分夥伴擁有專屬的強化道具，使用後可隨機提升能力值一點 = Some partners have special enhancement props, and they can increase their ability value at random after use.
夥伴的友好度若過低，戰鬥中將有機會叛逃 = If a pet's amity is too low, it might run away during the battle.
泡溫泉可提升 HP 跟 SP 上限，每一座溫泉可提升各 10 點 = Relaxing in hot springs can increase the HP and SP limits by 10 points each.
裝備一旦耐久變 0 將會損壞無法發揮作用\n損壞的裝備可透過修裝回復 = Once the durability of an item reaches 0, the damaged item cannot be restored through repair.
可在「背包」介面更改夥伴的名稱 = The name of the pet can be changed on the "Item" interface

我給牠弄了點吃的，結果牠就不肯走，直接把我當牠的救星了！ = I got him some food, but he refused to leave and directly treated me as his savior!

這是公會改良後的新系統。以前製作時，每次都要翻找設計圖，既不方便又不環保。現在，只要獲得設計圖並在背包內使用，它就會自動收藏到製作之書。之後，只要在小屋內的器械工具中，就能直接查看並製作，不需要再手動翻找設計圖了。 = This is a new system improved by the guild.\nIn the past, when I was making, I had to search for design pictures every time, which was not convenient and environmentally friendly.\nNow, as long as you get the design and use it in your backpack, it will automatically be collected into the produced book.\nAfter that, you can view and make it directly in the instruments and tools in the hut, and there is no need to manually search for the design map.

將普通木頭與黃蘋果進行合成，不可能合出什麼？ = What is impossible to synthesize ordinary wood heads with yellow apples?
沒錯！合成的結果會受到材料的屬性影響，比如你用普通木頭和黃蘋果合成，是不可能得到「普通石塊」的，因為這兩種材料都不具備石頭的屬性。 = That's right!\nThe results of synthesis will be affected by the properties of the material. For example, if you synthesize it with ordinary wood and yellow apple, it is impossible to get "ordinary stones" because neither of these two materials have the properties of stones.
哦～原來是這樣！這跟我以前學的概念差不多，老師也說過合成時要考慮材料的屬性，這樣才能大致預測會得到什麼。 = Oh~So that's the case!\nThis is similar to the concept I learned before. The teacher also said that when synthesis, you must consider the attributes of the materials so that you can roughly predict what you will get.
哈？我還以為你上課都在睡覺。 = ha?\nI thought you were sleeping in class.
喂！我可是很認真的！ = Hello!\nI really believe it!
哈哈，你們真有趣。不過他說的沒錯，這就是鍊金術的核心之一。只要熟悉這些規則，就能靈活運用合成，創造出自己想要的物品。 = Haha, you're so funny.\nBut what he said is right, this is one of the core of the elbow metal technique.\nAs long as you are familiar with these rules, you can use synthesis to create the items you want.

　　哈哈，來談談其他篇的故事吧！在這片幻境中飄浮了好長一段時間，每天都面臨各種挑戰，但這段旅程中，我也遇到了一些難以歸類的事情。\n\n　　這些事件不是關於戰鬥、生存或社交，而是更多元化的內容。\n\n　　所以，我把這些非常識的故事集結在其他篇中。\n\n　　在這些記錄中，或許您會發現一些有趣的秘密、神秘的傳說，甚至是一些令人驚奇的事情，我希望這些內容能夠讓您更好地享受幻境之旅，同時激發您的探險精神。 =　　Haha, let’s talk about other stories!\nI have been floating in this fantasy for a long time and faced various challenges every day, but during this journey, I have also encountered some difficult things.\n\n\nThese events are not about fighting, survival or socializing, but more diverse content.\n\n\nSo, I put these very knowledgable stories in other articles.\n\n\nIn these records, you may find some interesting secrets, mysterious stories, or even some amazing things. I hope these contents will allow you to enjoy the fantasy journey better and inspire your spirit of exploration.
該角色小於30級，將立即刪除。請在下方框中輸入＂刪除角色＂才可以進行刪除。 = This character is less than 30th level and will be deleted immediately.\nPlease enter "Delete Role" in the box below to delete it.
刪除角色 = Delete roles
若要刪除角色，帳號中將會沒有任何的角色，刪除角色後回到登入畫面，是否確定要刪除？ = To delete a role, there will be no roles in your account. After deleting the role, go back to the login screen. Are you sure you want to delete it?

不同的花代表著許多不同的含意，黃色玫瑰花是代表失戀的愛，那就表示這個人失戀了。 = Different flowers represent many different meanings. Yellow roses represent a love that is lost, which means that this person is lost.
反之如果是紅色的話，那就表示熱戀的愛情，那這個人一定是在熱戀期。 = On the contrary, if it is red, it means a passionate love, and this person must be in a hot period.

Please provide immediate support from all charcoal teachers and can refer to the structured materials provided in the commissioned book to make charcoals.

Please provide immediate support from all the elbows and can be made by referring to the structured materials provided in the commissioned book.

你好，我是來自製作師協會的初級製作師，請問有什麼可以為你服務的呢？ = Hello, I am a junior producer from the Producer Association. Can you please ask what can I do to serve you?
如何接受製作公會的委託？ = How to accept commission from the production guild?
如何開始製作？ = How to start making?
什麼是製作排程？ = What is production schedule?
如何提升製作效率？ = How to improve production efficiency?
關於製作的建議？ = Suggestions for production?
我沒有問題了。 = I have no problem.
如果要接受委託，可以從我身旁的【公會委託板】上查看。所有公會的委託都會顯示在這裡，你可以挑選適合的委託來完成。 = If you want to accept the commission, you can check it out on the [Community Commission Board] next to me.\nAll guild commissions will be displayed here and you can choose the appropriate commission to complete.
首先，你需要在自己的小屋內擺放【器械工具】，這樣才能選擇製作項目。 = First, you need to place [Instrument Tools] in your hut to choose a production project.
當你選擇好製作項目後，它就會自動加入【製作排程】，並立即開始製作。不論你是否在小屋內，甚至離線，製作都會持續進行，直到完成為止。 = Once you choose a good production project, it will automatically join the [Production Schedule] and start production immediately.\nWhether you are in the cabin or even off the line, the production will continue until it is completed.
製作排程會依照加入的順序自動製作，如果想調整順序，就需要先暫停目前的製作項目，才能重新安排。 = The production schedule will be automatically produced in accordance with the added sequence. If you want to adjust the sequence, you need to pause the current production project before you can reschedule.
另外，你還可以指派【人形夥伴】協助製作，這樣可以縮短製作時間。不過，協助製作會消耗夥伴的【友好度】，當友好度降至0時，製作就無法加速了。 = In addition, you can also assign [Humanoid Partners] to assist in the production, which can shorten the production time.\nHowever, assisting production consumes the partner's [friendliness], and when the friendship drops to 0, production cannot be accelerated.
除了指派夥伴協助縮短時間，你也可以在小屋內擺放特殊家具來提升便利性。例如【桌上型電腦】可以增加製作排程的數量，而【磨坊】則能讓你一次製作更多相同的物品，讓製作過程更加順暢。 = In addition to assigning partners to shorten time, you can also place special furniture in the cabin to improve convenience.\nFor example, [Desktop Computer] can increase the number of production schedules, while [Milling] can allow you to make more of the same items at once, making the production process more smooth.
你可以利用【製作樹狀圖】來查看所有可製作的項目，這樣能更清楚了解下一步該製作什麼。 = You can use the [Make Tree Status] to view all the projects that can be made to get a better understanding of what to do next.
如果有疑問，隨時可以來找我詢問，或者從【求生指南】中查詢相關內容，裡面會有更詳細的說明！ = If you have any questions, you can ask me at any time, or check the relevant content in the [Survival Guide], and there will be more detailed instructions in it!

蘋果 = apple

如果研究成功，我甚至有機會做出一種能讓人隨時變身的道具！ = If the research is successful, I even have the opportunity to make a prop that can make people change at any time!

如果今天又沒吃到……那麼我……那麼我…… = If I didn't eat it today... Then I... Then I...

這次我就幫妳吧，好好等我不要動歪腦筋！ = I'll help you this time, wait for me and don't tamper with my brain!
這說起來有點複雜，但總之全都是那次實驗造成的…… = This is a bit complicated, but it is all caused by that experiment...
我在森林裡發現了一些黑色的蘑菇，散發著很特別的氣味。我想研究它們的特性，就帶回了一些樣本。 = I found some black mushrooms in the forest, which emitted a very special smell.\nI wanted to study their characteristics, so I brought back some samples.
結果某天，我不小心把黑色孢子弄散了，吸進了太多…… = As a result, one day, I accidentally dispersed the black spores and sucked too much...
她這次又有什麼餿主意了？ = What's her idea this time?

……麻繩。 = ...Macao.

問題是這樣子的，我一點鐘敲一下、二點鐘敲兩下、三點鐘敲三下，那麼我經過12小時總共敲了幾下呢？ = The problem is like this. I knocked it in one minute, two minutes, and three minutes, so how many times did I knock it in a total of 12 hours?

好像不對耶，沒關係，我自己再算算看好了…… = It seems that it is not right, it doesn't matter, I will do it myself...
幫助敲鐘的工人解決他的困擾吧！ = Help the bell-knocking workers solve his troubles!
每一次敲鐘都是一次對自己的挑戰，要保持節奏和準確度，不能有一絲差錯。 = Every knocking is a challenge to oneself. You must maintain the rhythm and accuracy, and there must be no errors.
不知道今天晚餐要吃些什麼… = I don't know what to eat for dinner today...
唉呀，沒錯沒錯，還是你比較聰明，這個就當作是你的獎勵吧。 = Oh, it's OK, you're smarter, this is your reward.

怎麼會有一匹白狼在這裡？ = Why is there a white wolf here?
啊！這匹狼好像被捕獸夾夾住了耶！ = ah!\nThis wolf seems to have been arrested and trapped!
被夾傷得好嚴重，我立刻就幫你扳開。 = I'll help you to get hurt so seriously.
你沒事吧？ = You're fine, right?
喂你別跑這麼快呀！傷口…… = Hello, don't run so fast!\nInjury...

The prizes of each door can be won at most once.\n2. Consumer Determination Green Diamond & Green Diamond is calculated based on the game account. If you can win the prize, please confirm whether the prize character is correct. Once the prize is successful, it will not be transferred to other characters.\n3. The official reserves the right to modify the activity laws and awards at any time or suspend this activity.\n4. The above content is based on the information within the game.
